thread.title: WATCH: Star thanks wife AND girlfriend
thread.title_full: WATCH: Star thanks wife AND girlfriend

title: WATCH: Star thanks wife AND girlfriend
text:
However, the 22-year-old striker could now be in trouble with his wife after scoring an own goal during a revealing post-match interview on live TV, which has been branded the best man-of-the-match speech of all time. 
"Firstly I appreciate my fans," Anas began before adding: "[And] my wife and my girlfriend." 
After realising his mistake, Anas attempted to make amends as the camera continued to roll. 
"I'm so sorry, my wife!" he quickly added. "I love you so much from my heart." 
"Thanks for supporting me there is more to come," he blundered on before the interview came to an end.
